term.title: anion exchanger

item.text: Ion exchanger with anions as counter-ions. The term anion-exchange resin may be used in the case of solid organic polymers. The base form of an anion exchanger is the ionic form in which the counter-ions are hydroxide groups (OH– form) or the ionogenic groups form an uncharged base, e.g. –NH.
